Description:
Experience of working Design, Manufacturing, Packaging, Qualification, and Integration.
Systems Engineering best practices experience.
Excellent verbal, written and presentation communication skills.
Computer Aided Mechanical Design and Manufacturing, Part Modeling, Assembly, Mechanisms, 2D Drawings.
Computer Aided Thermal, Vibration and Stress Analysis.
Understand Geometric Dimensioning & Tolerancing (GD&T).
Good knowledge of manufacturing processes.
Good knowledge of measurement of mechanical parameters of a system.
Understanding product specifications and quality control measures.
Knowledge of safety rules and regulations.
Proficient in MS Office software including Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint.Job Details
